use_cases

Class EventManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • use_cases.EventManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class EventManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Represents the entire system of Events and their locations and speakers.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        Parameters:
        events - given HashMap of Event IDs to Event objects.
        locations - given ArrayList of location Strings
        speakers - given ArrayList of speaker usernames

        public java.lang.Integer addNewEvent(java.lang.String topic,

                                     java.lang.String location,

                              throws ConflictException,
                                     ObjectNotFoundException
        Adds a new event given its information
        Parameters:
        topic - topic for a new event
        time - time for a new event
        location - location for a new event
        organizer - organizer for a new event
        Returns:
        id for a new id which has been added
        Throws:
        ConflictException - if checkValidEvent throws
        ObjectNotFoundException - if checkValidEvent throws

      • addNewTalk

                                    java.lang.String speaker)
                             throws ConflictException,
                                    ObjectNotFoundException
        Adds a new event given its information
        Parameters:
        topic - topic for a new event
        time - time for a new event
        location - location for a new event
        organizer - organizer for a new event
        speaker - speaker for a new event
        Returns:
        id for a new id which has been added
        Throws:
        ConflictException - if checkValidEvent throws or a speaker is invalid
        ObjectNotFoundException - if checkValidEvent throws
